text: (saturange napura palanaya karana andamin ovunge) le miyehi ælena turu (ovunva pana pitin) sira gata kirima kisima nabivarayekuta sudusu næta. oba melova vastunta asa karannehuya. allah nam, (obage) paralova (jivitaya) kæmati vanneya. allah balasampannayeku vana atara gnanavantayeku vasayen sitinneya
